metadata.title: CVE-2025-1011 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A bug in WebAssembly code generation could have lead to a crash. It mayhave been possible for an attacker to leverage this to achieve codeexecution. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 135, Firefox ESR < 128.7,Thunderbird < 128.7, and Thunderbird < 135.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
